00028 #ifndef __OgreWindowEventUtils_H__
00029 #define __OgreWindowEventUtils_H__
00030 
00031 #include "OgrePrerequisites.h"
00032 #include "OgrePlatform.h"
00033 
00034 #if OGRE_PLATFORM == OGRE_PLATFORM_WIN32
00035 #  if !defined(WIN32_LEAN_AND_MEAN)
00036 #   define WIN32_LEAN_AND_MEAN
00037 #  endif
00038 #  if !defined(NOMINMAX) && defined(_MSC_VER)
00039 #   define NOMINMAX // required to stop windows.h messing up std::min
00040 #  endif
00041 #  include <windows.h>
00042 #elif OGRE_PLATFORM == OGRE_PLATFORM_APPLE && !defined(__LP64__)
00043 #  include <Carbon/Carbon.h>
00044 #endif
00045

00047 
00048 namespace Ogre
00049 {
00060     class _OgreExport WindowEventListener
00061     {
00062     public:
00063         virtual ~WindowEventListener() {}
00064 
00071         virtual void windowMoved(RenderWindow* rw)
00072                 { (void)rw; }
00073 
00080         virtual void windowResized(RenderWindow* rw)
00081                 { (void)rw; }
00082 
00090         virtual bool windowClosing(RenderWindow* rw)
00091         { (void)rw; return true; }
00092 
00103         virtual void windowClosed(RenderWindow* rw)
00104                 { (void)rw; }
00105 
00112         virtual void windowFocusChange(RenderWindow* rw)
00113                 { (void)rw; }
00114     };
00115 
00120     class _OgreExport WindowEventUtilities
00121     {
00122     public:
00128         static void messagePump();
00129 
00140         static void addWindowEventListener( RenderWindow* window, WindowEventListener* listener );
00141 
00150         static void removeWindowEventListener( RenderWindow* window, WindowEventListener* listener );
00151 
00159         static void _addRenderWindow(RenderWindow* window);
00160 
00168         static void _removeRenderWindow(RenderWindow* window);
00169 
00170 #if OGRE_PLATFORM == OGRE_PLATFORM_WIN32
00171 
00172         static LRESULT CALLBACK _WndProc(HWND hWnd, UINT uMsg, WPARAM wParam, LPARAM lParam);
00173 #elif OGRE_PLATFORM == OGRE_PLATFORM_APPLE && !defined __OBJC__ && !defined(__LP64__)
00174 
00175         static OSStatus _CarbonWindowHandler(EventHandlerCallRef nextHandler, EventRef event, void* wnd);
00176 #endif
00177 
00178         //These are public only so GLXProc can access them without adding Xlib headers header
00179         typedef multimap<RenderWindow*, WindowEventListener*>::type WindowEventListeners;
00180         static WindowEventListeners _msListeners;
00181 
00182         typedef vector<RenderWindow*>::type Windows;
00183         static Windows _msWindows;
00184     };
00187 }
